description: VLAgentRemoteWriteSettings - defines global settings for all remoteWrite urls.

flushInterval.description: Interval for flushing the data to remote storage. (default 1s)

maxBlockSize.description: The maximum size of unpacked request to send to remote storage

maxDiskUsagePerURL.description: The maximum file-based buffer size in bytes at -remoteWrite.tmpDataPath

showURL.description: Whether to show -remoteWrite.url in the exported metrics. It is hidden by default, since it can contain sensitive auth info

tmpDataPath.description: Path to directory where temporary data for remote write component is stored (default /vlagent_pq/vlagent-remotewrite-data) If defined, operator ignores spec.storage field and skips adding volume and volumeMount for pq
